edu.wpi.grip.core.sockets

Interface InputSocket<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the value that this socket stores.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Socket<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InputSocket.Decorator, InputSocketImpl

    public interface InputSocket<T>
extends Socket<T>
    Represents the input into an Operation.
